title: 110+ project management statistics and trends for 2025
content: The monday.com blog features an article titled '110+ project management statistics and trends for 2025'. This article covers various aspects of project management, including key statistics and emerging trends relevant to the year 2025. Topics discussed likely include project success rates, budget adherence, team collaboration effectiveness, and the impact of new technologies like AI on project management. The blog aims to provide insights and data-driven information for professionals in the project management field, helping them understand the current landscape and prepare for future challenges and opportunities.
